name: Voodoo Shango live at DROM Taberna
description:
Led by the electrifying Johnny "Papa" Shango — master composer, singer, guitarist, and trombonist — Voodoo Shango Experience is a full-throttle tribute to the raw power of '70s and '80s funk culture, with a cinematic and literary twist. Their references are bold, their vibe is contagious, and their one true mission is to spread pure, unfiltered groove. Heads will bob. Hips will shake. Souls will ignite.

Surrounded by heavy-hitters from Quebec's indie scene (Colectivo, Grimskunk, Funkafones), Johnny Shango cranks out a sound that channels the explosive energy of James Brown, the swagger of Lenny Kravitz, and the spirit of an endless funk party.
